item.title: I made a learning kit of word2vec/doc2vec/GloVe/fastText
item.description: This article is the 21st day of [Natural Language Processing #2 Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/nlp2). By the way, it’s my birthday today. Please celebrate ~~ M’s book that sets a deadline for birthday ~ ~ #Introduction In the word embedding world, BERT has been terrifying over the past year, and even ELMo is becoming less visible. Sometimes I still want to use legacy distributed representations like word2vec or GloVe. In addition, you may want to learn with your data (at least for me) So, I made a learning kit for word2vec/doc2vec/GloVe/fastText for myself, so I will publish it.
